Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

TestTrajectory.cxx

19 #include "KSMagneticFieldDipole.h"

27 #include "TApplication.h"

34 #include <sstream>
35 using std::stringstream;
36 
37 using namespace Kassiopeia;
38 using namespace katrin;
39 
40 int main( int anArgc, char** anArgv )
41 {
42  // read in xml file
43  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
44  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor;
45  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
46  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
47  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
48  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
49  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
50  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
51 
52  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
53  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
54  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
55  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
56  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
57  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
58  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
59 
60  KTextFile tInputFile;
61  tInputFile.AddToBases( "TestTrajectory.xml" );
62  tInputFile.AddToPaths( string( CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/Validation" ) );
63  tXMLTokenizer.ProcessFile( &tInputFile );
64 
65  // read in command line parameters
66  if( anArgc <= 1 )
67  {
68  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
69  mainmsg << "usage:" << ret;
70  mainmsg << "TestTrajectory <count=UNSIGNED INT> <command=PARENT.FIELD:CHILD>" << ret;
71  mainmsg << ret;
72  mainmsg << "available trajectory components found in " << CONFIG_DEFAULT_DIR << "/Validation/TestTrajectory.xml" << ret;
73  mainmsg << "link objects there to the root trajectory using the command interface above to test them" << ret;
74  mainmsg << eom;
75  return -1;
76  }
77 
78  unsigned int tCount;
79  KSObject* tParent;
80  KSObject* tChild;
81  KSCommand* tCommand;
82  vector< KSCommand* > tCommands;
83  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
84  vector< KSCommand* >::reverse_iterator tCommandRIt;
85  size_t tEqualsPos;
86  size_t tPeriodPos;
87  size_t tColonPos;
88  string tArgument;
89  string tArgumentLabel;
90  string tArgumentValue;
91  string tCommandParent;
92  string tCommandField;
93  string tCommandChild;
94  stringstream tArgumentConverter;
95  for( int tArgumentIndex = 1; tArgumentIndex < anArgc; tArgumentIndex++ )
96  {
97  tArgument.assign( anArgv[ tArgumentIndex ] );
98 
99  tEqualsPos = tArgument.find( '=' );
100  if( tEqualsPos == string::npos )
101  {
102  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
103  mainmsg << "malformed argument <" << tArgument << ">" << ret;
104  mainmsg << "arguments must be of form <NAME=VALUE>" << ret;
105  mainmsg << eom;
106  return -1;
107  }
108 
109  tArgumentLabel = tArgument.substr( 0, tEqualsPos );
110  tArgumentValue = tArgument.substr( tEqualsPos + 1 );
111 
112  if( tArgumentLabel == "count" )
113  {
114  tArgumentConverter.clear();
115  tArgumentConverter.str( tArgumentValue );
116  tArgumentConverter >> tCount;
117  continue;
118  }
119 
120  if( tArgumentLabel == "command" )
121  {
122  tPeriodPos = tArgumentValue.find( '.' );
123  tColonPos = tArgumentValue.find( ':' );
124 
125  if( (tPeriodPos == string::npos) || (tColonPos == string::npos) || (tColonPos < tPeriodPos) )
126  {
127  mainmsg( eWarning ) << ret;
128  mainmsg << "malformed argument <" << tArgument << ">" << ret;
129  mainmsg << "command arguments must be of form <command=PARENT.FIELD:CHILD>" << ret;
130  mainmsg << eom;
131  return -1;
132  }
133 
134  tCommandParent = tArgumentValue.substr( 0, tPeriodPos );
135  tCommandField = tArgumentValue.substr( tPeriodPos + 1, tColonPos - tPeriodPos - 1 );
136  tCommandChild = tArgumentValue.substr( tColonPos + 1 );
137 
138  tParent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get( tCommandParent );
139  tChild = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get( tCommandChild );
140  tCommand = tParent->CreateCommand( tCommandField );
141  tCommand->BindParent( tParent );
142  tCommand->BindChild( tChild );
143  tCommands.push_back( tCommand );
144  }
145  }
146 
147  // initialize root
148  TApplication tApplication( "Test Trajectory", 0, NULL );
149 
150  TCanvas tParticlePositionCanvas( "particle_position_canvas", "Particle Position" );
151  TPolyMarker3D tParticlePositionGraph;
152 
153  TCanvas tParticleXPositionCanvas( "particle_x_position_canvas", "Particle X Position" );
154  TGraph tParticleXPositionGraph;
155 
156  TCanvas tParticleYPositionCanvas( "particle_y_position_canvas", "Particle Y Position" );
157  TGraph tParticleYPositionGraph;
158 
159  TCanvas tParticleZPositionCanvas( "particle_z_position_canvas", "Particle Z Position" );
160  TGraph tParticleZPositionGraph;
161 
162  TCanvas tParticleLengthCanvas( "particle_length_canvas", "Particle Length" );
163  TGraph tParticleLengthGraph;
164 
165  TCanvas tParticleKineticEnergyCanvas( "particle_kinetic_energy_canvas", "Particle Kinetic Energy" );
166  TGraph tParticleKineticEnergyGraph;
167 
168  TCanvas tParticleTotalEnergyCanvas( "particle_total_energy_canvas", "Particle Total Energy" );
169  TGraph tParticleTotalEnergyGraph;
170 
171  // create simulation object
172  KSStep tStep;
173 
174  // initialize root trajectory
175  KSRootTrajectory* tRootTrajectory = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSRootTrajectory >( "root_trajectory" );
176  tRootTrajectory->SetStep( &tStep );
177 
178  tRootTrajectory->Initialize();
179  for( tCommandIt = tCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != tCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
180  {
181  tCommand = *tCommandIt;
182  tCommand->Initialize();
183  }
184 
185  tRootTrajectory->Activate();
186  for( tCommandIt = tCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != tCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
187  {
188  tCommand = *tCommandIt;
189  tCommand->Activate();
190  }
191 
192  // initialize fields
193  KSMagneticFieldDipole tMagneticFieldDipolePlus;
194  tMagneticFieldDipolePlus.SetLocation( KThreeVector( 0., 0., 1. ) );
195  tMagneticFieldDipolePlus.SetMoment( KThreeVector( 0., 0., 15000. ) );
196 
197  KSMagneticFieldDipole tMagneticFieldDipoleMinus;
198  tMagneticFieldDipoleMinus.SetLocation( KThreeVector( 0., 0., -1. ) );
199  tMagneticFieldDipoleMinus.SetMoment( KThreeVector( 0., 0., 15000. ) );
200 
201  KSRootMagneticField tRootMagneticField;
202  tRootMagneticField.AddMagneticField( &tMagneticFieldDipolePlus );
203  tRootMagneticField.AddMagneticField( &tMagneticFieldDipoleMinus );
204 
205  KSElectricFieldConstant tElectricFieldConstant;
206  tElectricFieldConstant.SetField( KThreeVector( 0., 0., 0. ) );
207 
208  KSRootElectricField tRootElectricField;
209  tRootElectricField.AddElectricField( &tElectricFieldConstant );
210 
211  // initialize primary
212  KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().SetMagneticField( &tRootMagneticField );
213  KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().SetElectricField( &tRootElectricField );
214  KSParticle* tPrimary = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
215  tPrimary->SetTime( 0. );
216  tPrimary->SetLength( 0. );
217  tPrimary->SetPosition( 1., 0., 0. );
218  tPrimary->SetKineticEnergy_eV( 5. );
219  tPrimary->SetPolarAngleToZ( 1. );
220  tPrimary->SetAzimuthalAngleToX( 0. );
221 
222  // calculate steps
223  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "starting calculation..." << eom;
224 
225  tStep.InitialParticle() = *tPrimary;
226  tStep.IntegrationParticle() = *tPrimary;
227  tStep.InterpolationParticle() = *tPrimary;
228  tStep.InteractionParticle() = *tPrimary;
229  tStep.FinalParticle() = *tPrimary;
230  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tCount; tIndex++ )
231  {
232  tRootTrajectory->ExecuteIntegration( 1. );
233 
234  tParticlePositionGraph.SetPoint( tParticleXPositionGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetX(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetY(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetZ() );
235  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetPoint( tParticleXPositionGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetX() );
236  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetPoint( tParticleYPositionGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetY() );
237  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetPoint( tParticleZPositionGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetZ() );
238  tParticleLengthGraph.SetPoint( tParticleLengthGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetLength() );
239  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetPoint( tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetKineticEnergy_eV() );
240  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetPoint( tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.GetN(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetTime(), tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetKineticEnergy_eV() - tStep.IntegrationParticle().GetElectricPotential() );
241 
242  tStep.InitialParticle() = tStep.IntegrationParticle();
243 
244  if( tIndex % 100000 == 0 )
245  {
246  mainmsg( eNormal ) << " calculated " << tIndex << " steps" << reom;
247  }
248 
249  }
250  mainmsg( eNormal ) << " calculated " << tCount << " steps" << eom;
251 
252  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "...finished calculation" << eom;
253 
254  // show plots
255  tParticlePositionCanvas.cd( 0 );
256  tParticlePositionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
257  tParticlePositionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
258  tParticlePositionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
259  tParticlePositionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
260 
261  tParticleXPositionCanvas.cd( 0 );
262  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
263  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
264  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
265  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
266  tParticleXPositionGraph.SetTitle( "Particle X Position vs Time" );
267  tParticleXPositionGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
268  tParticleXPositionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "X [m]" );
269  tParticleXPositionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
270 
271  tParticleYPositionCanvas.cd( 0 );
272  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
273  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
274  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
275  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
276  tParticleYPositionGraph.SetTitle( "Particle Y Position vs Time" );
277  tParticleYPositionGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
278  tParticleYPositionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Y [m]" );
279  tParticleYPositionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
280 
281  tParticleZPositionCanvas.cd( 0 );
282  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
283  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
284  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
285  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
286  tParticleZPositionGraph.SetTitle( "Particle Z Position vs Time" );
287  tParticleZPositionGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
288  tParticleZPositionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Z [m]" );
289  tParticleZPositionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
290 
291  tParticleLengthCanvas.cd( 0 );
292  tParticleLengthGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
293  tParticleLengthGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
294  tParticleLengthGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
295  tParticleLengthGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
296  tParticleLengthGraph.SetTitle( "Particle Length vs Time" );
297  tParticleLengthGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
298  tParticleLengthGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "Length [m]" );
299  tParticleLengthGraph.Draw( "AP" );
300 
301  tParticleKineticEnergyCanvas.cd( 0 );
302  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
303  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
304  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
305  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
306  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.SetTitle( "Particle Kinetic Energy vs Time" );
307  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
308  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "K [eV]" );
309  tParticleKineticEnergyGraph.Draw( "AP" );
310 
311  tParticleTotalEnergyCanvas.cd( 0 );
312  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
313  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
314  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
315  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
316  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.SetTitle( "Particle Total Energy vs Time" );
317  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "T [sec]" );
318  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "E [eV]" );
319  tParticleTotalEnergyGraph.Draw( "AP" );
320 
321  tApplication.Run();
322 
323  // deinitialize kassiopeia
324  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
325  {
326  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
327  tCommand->Deactivate();
328  }
329  tRootTrajectory->Deactivate();
330 
331  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
332  {
333  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
334  tCommand->Deinitialize();
335  }
336  tRootTrajectory->Deinitialize();
337 
338  for( tCommandRIt = tCommands.rbegin(); tCommandRIt != tCommands.rend(); tCommandRIt++ )
339  {
340  tCommand = *tCommandRIt;
341  delete tCommand;
342  }
343 
344 
345  return 0;
346 }
